section.heading: affix
section.def: conjugates a verb in the assumptive/deductive mood
(+ㄹ) conjugates a verb in the hortative mood

entry.aside: The assumptive/deductive mood is used to show that the information is not known, but that it is usually true under similar conditions. The hortative mood is used to urge another to act. Both moods can be represented by the word must in English (This must be the case/You must do this for me).
